targets.query: SELECT ((SUM("Solar") - SUM("ExportEDP")) * 100) / SUM("Solar") AS "Poupança Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000)  AS "Solar",  abs(mean(("activeGridExport")) / 1000)  AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h))
SELECT last("activePower3") FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT SUM("Dia") + SUM(Noite) AS "Custo EDP", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia  AS "Dia", (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)*$CustoEletricidadeNoite AS "Noite"  FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h))

SELECT SUM("Solar") + SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Poupança Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h))

SELECT SUM("Dia") + SUM(Noite) AS "Custo EDP", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia  AS "Dia", (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)*$CustoEletricidadeNoite AS "Noite"  FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h))

SELECT SUM("Dia") + SUM(Noite) AS "Custo EDP", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia  AS "Dia", (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)*$CustoEletricidadeNoite AS "Noite"  FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h))

SELECT SUM("Solar") + SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Poupança Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(31d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") + SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Poupança Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(31d)
SELECT ABS(last("activeGridExport")) FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("current") FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activePower3")  / 1000 AS "Consumo" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activeGridImport")  / 1000 AS "Rede Import" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activePower2")  / 1000 AS "Energia Solar" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activeGridExport") / 1000 AS "Rede Export" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activePower3")  / 1000 AS "Consumo Total" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activeGridImport")  / 1000 AS "Consumo Rede" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("activePower2")  / 1000 AS "Produção Solar" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT abs(mean("activeGridExport")) / 1000 AS "Envio Rede" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT SUM("Dia") AS "Custo Dia", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000) *$CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Dia" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Noite") AS "Custo Noite", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)* $CustoEletricidadeNoite AS "Noite" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Noite") + SUM("Dia") AS "Simples", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)* 0.198522 AS "Noite",  (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000)* 0.198522 AS "Dia" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Noite") + SUM("Dia") AS "Bi-Horario", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)* $CustoEletricidadeNoite AS "Noite",  (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000)* $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Dia" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") + SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Poupança Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") AS "Produção Solar", time, SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Entrega EDP" FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) * $CustoEletricidadeDia AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT SUM("Dia") AS "Dia", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000) AS "Dia" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT SUM("Noite") AS "Noite", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)  AS "Noite" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") + SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Consumo Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000)  AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") AS "Produção Solar", time, SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Entrega EDP" FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000)  AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT SUM("Dia") AS "Dia", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostDia") / 1000) AS "Dia" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT SUM("Noite") AS "Noite", time  FROM (SELECT (mean("activeGridImportCostNoite") / 1000)  AS "Noite" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") + SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Consumo Solar", time FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000)  AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000) AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT SUM("Solar") AS "Produção Solar", time, SUM("ExportEDP") AS "Entrega EDP" FROM (SELECT (mean("activePower2") / 1000) AS "Solar",  (mean("activeGridExport") / 1000)  AS "ExportEDP" FROM "Messungen" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)) GROUP BY time(1d)
